data.title: About Us — Wise Guys
data.meta_description: We have all the creative tools to come up with unique, attention-grabbing campaigns and also the crew, skills and equipment to film them. Our business is powered by writers, directors, cinematographers, producers, focus pullers, make-up artists, costume designers, and all kinds of artists and storyt
data.text:
Wise Guys was founded by filmmakers.

For more than a decade we have exceeded our clients’ expectations and changed the way they think about their video production.

The explosion of video in digital marketing means that just doing something isn’t enough, you need to do it differently and more importantly, better than the competition.

We make films. that’s all we do.

We have all the creative tools to come up with unique, attention-grabbing campaigns and also the crew, skills and equipment to film them. Our business is powered by writers, directors, cinematographers, producers, focus pullers, make-up artists, costume designers, and all kinds of artists and storytellers - the only thing we’re missing is your story to tell.

You might be a company that needs full service video production from creative to final product, you might already have an agency for your website, social media and apps but want somebody specialist to handle your film, you might be a creative agency looking for someone to turn your beautiful concept into a beautiful film - whatever it is, we got you.
